oai_dc:dc.dc:title: J.P. Matthew's Store, 1929
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: J.P. Matthew's Store demonstration of J.F.G. Special Coffee and Swan's products. February 28, 1929. J.P. Matthew's Store, Morristown, Tennessee. Broadside. 1 pc.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides; Ephemera; Grocery stores; Coffee;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: FREE at J. P. MATTHEWS' STORE A DEMONSTRATION OF "J. F. G. Special Coffee" and Swan's Products THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 28, 1929 We will give one 10ct Cake of Toilet Soap FREE with each purchase of "J. F. G. Special Coffee." From now until that date we will give Tickets with each purchase of "J. F. G. Special Coffee" and any of Swan's Products and any Best Food Products and Clover Leaf Lard, entitling the holder to a chance on a $5 Swan's Cake and 4 1-lb cans of "J. F.G. Special Coffee," 2 Jars each of Best Foods Mayonaise and Relish and 12 Packages of Clover Leaf Bacon, and other Prizes on display at our Store. Coffee, Cake and Sandwiches Will be Served All Day A taste will convince you that "J. F. G Special Coffee" is r[e]ally "The Best Part of the Meal," and that Swan's Products have NO equal Prizes Will Be Given Away Promptly at 4 P. M. Remember the Date and Place J. P. MATTHEWS' STORE 500 South Cumberland St. - - - Morristown, Tennessee "Home of Best Quality, Courteous Service and Correct Prices."
